Key Activity 1: Operationalization of the NCDC Gateway.  The NCDC Gateway PIU will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of the NCDC Gateway. This includes  procurement,  coordination  and  communication  with stakeholders, advocacy,  grievance  redress,  risk  management,  capacity  building,  performance  management, monitoring, and evaluation, documentation, report writing, policy briefs and publications.
To provide oversight and coordination for the implementation of the NCDC Gateway
